intro: Psychotria graciliflora, commonly known as the slender-flowered psychotria, is a species of flowering plant in the Rubiaceae family. It is native to tropical regions of South America, particularly Brazil, and thrives in humid, shaded environments. The plant is characterized by its delicate, elongated leaves and small, white or pale pink flowers. It is often found in rainforests and is adapted to low light conditions. Due to its ornamental value and ecological significance, it is sometimes cultivated in botanical gardens.
